channel.title: Douglas Hofstadter on
channel.description: Recent content in Douglas Hofstadter on

item.title: I Am a Strange Loop
item.description: An excessively discursive book that just gets more and more sanctimonious as it goes? (Or stoned.) We parted ways strongly over the big-souled, small-souled, no-souled thing ([[notes/thinking people are stupid is the gateway drug to worse ideas|eeesh]])([[notes/the indigenous attribution of agency|also this]]), and he never won me back over.
